alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Cass; Eddy; Ransom; Richland; Sargent; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 7:05PM CDT until April 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph on Friday. * WHERE...Southeast North Dakota and adjacent portions of west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities less than a quarter mile are anticipated from heavy snow rates. Accumulating snow will make travel difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With ongoing flooding and water filled ditches, it is possible that vehicles may slide off the road into very cold water. Uncertainty remains in snow amounts and associated impacts, due to melting and compaction.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Benson; Cass; Eddy; Ransom; Richland; Sargent; Towner
